name: Dicey Situation (deusion, Smet19, happyharvey)
description:
A game where you are a dice and objective is to survive against the dreadful snakes as they come to get you!

Controls:

  • - WASD to Move
  • - Space to roll the dice
  • - Left click to shoot

Created by:

  • Divesh Mahesh Jagger
  • Junsu Jang
  • Mikhail "Mike" Smetankin
  • Rohan Sunil
  • Lik Ching (Harvey) Pang
  • Xinyu Dong
